member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.Composite.UnityExtensions.UnityBootstrapper
member.summary: Base class that provides a basic bootstrapping sequence that registers most of the Composite Application Library assets in a .
member.remarks: This class must be overriden to provide application specific configuration.

member.summary: Runs the bootstrapper process.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Composite.UnityExtensions.UnityBootstrapper.ConfigureContainer
member.summary: Configures the . May be overwritten in a derived class to add specific type mappings required by the application.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Composite.UnityExtensions.UnityBootstrapper.ConfigureRegionAdapterMappings
member.summary: Configures the default region adapter mappings to use in the application, in order to adapt UI controls defined in XAML to use a region and register it automatically. May be overwritten in a derived class to add specific mappings required by the application.
member.returns: The instance containing all the mappings.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Composite.UnityExtensions.UnityBootstrapper.InitializeModules

member.summary: Returns the module enumerator that will be used to initialize the modules.
member.remarks: When using the default initialization behavior, this method must be overwritten by a derived class.
member.returns: An instance of that will be used to initialize the modules.
